question: Who is selected as the brand ambassador of the Indian Indoor Cricket Team?
explanation: Former Indian batsman Sandeep Patil was today named as the brand ambassador of the Indian Indoor Cricket Team. The tournament will be held in partnership with Cricket Australia (CA) and Emirates Cricket Board (ECB). The 10th edition of the World Cup will include approximately 400 players and officials from Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, England, Sri Lanka, Singapore and Malaysia.
